org.company.jar

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.company.jar.JarUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a general purpose utility class for interacting with the fileSystem. In particular, for loading and saving files in the file system

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileUtil.SaveMode
      When saving a file and another one already exists with the same name: - OVERWRITE: overwrite the previous file - APPEND_NUMBER: modify the name of the file by appending a number at the end - DO_NOTHING: do nothing - THROW_EXCEPTION: throw exception if the file already exists

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String className 
      private static java.lang.String saveFileOnFileSystem 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private FileUtil()
      private constructor => not instantiable

      delete the given file from the file system

      Utility method to split a file absolute path into name (i.e.
      static java.io.File saveFileOnFileSystem(java.io.File fileWhereToSave, java.io.InputStream contentToSave, FileUtil.SaveMode behaviourFlag)
      save on file system content as byte array in a file

    • Method Detail

      • getFileNameAndExtension

        public static java.lang.String[] getFileNameAndExtension(java.io.File file)
        Utility method to split a file absolute path into name (i.e. path) and extension. If the file is null or with an empty path, return a String array [null, null]
        Parameters:
        file - the file object
        Returns:
        a String array: 0 is name/path, 1 is extension

      • saveFileOnFileSystem

        public static java.io.File saveFileOnFileSystem(java.io.File fileWhereToSave,
                                                java.io.InputStream contentToSave,
                                                FileUtil.SaveMode behaviourFlag)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        save on file system content as byte array in a file
        Parameters:
        fileWhereToSave - file object where to save the content
        contentToSave - the content to save (can be null)
        behaviourFlag - flag for behaviour if file already exists: - 0 overwrite the file - 1 create a new file appending a number at the end of the name - 2 do not write and exit quietly - 3 throw exception
        Returns:
        the file pointing to the saved content
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file already exists and the save mode flag was "THROW_EXCEPTION"
        java.io.IOException - if there were exceptions while writing the content of the file in the file system

      • deleteFileFromFileSystem

        public static void deleteFileFromFileSystem(java.io.File fileToDelete)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        delete the given file from the file system
        Parameters:
        fileToDelete - the file to delete
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the delete method of the File class returned false

      • deleteAllFilesInDirectory

        public static void deleteAllFilesInDirectory(java.io.File directoryContainingFilesToDelete)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        delete all files from the given directory
        Parameters:
        directoryContainingFilesToDelete - the directory containing the files to delete
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the delete method of the File class returned false
